experience.title: IT Intern
experience.description: Assisted with Tier 1 technical support, handling tasks such as Windows OS installation, laptop refurbishment, and troubleshooting basic issues. Trained new interns in Office 365, developed SOP manuals to streamline IT processes, and contributed to Salesforce integration and telephone line setup to enhance business operations.

experience.title: LTO Assistant
experience.description: Conducted interviews with different interlocutors and interpreted them during the Election Observation Mission. Assisted with research and compiling a report on election activities in Sarajevo Kanton and Bosansko-podrinjski Kanton.

experience.title: Academic Research Assistant
experience.description: Collaborated on research examining social networks in conflict periods, providing translation, transcription, and simultaneous interpretation for interviews in Bosnian/Serbian/Croatian-English. Supported data collection, managed legal documentation, facilitated communication with public officials, and offered cultural insights to enhance the research’s depth and relevance.

experience.title: Customer Support Agent
experience.description: Provided customer support for an energy company, assisting clients with billing inquiries, account management, and service-related issues.

volunteering.title: Volunteer
volunteering.description: Created an SOP for 3D printer usage and assisted in translating the monthly newsletter.

volunteering.title: Volunteer
volunteering.organization: Udruženje 'Centar za razvoj medija i analize'
volunteering.description: Gained familiarity with state procurement processes, tracked compliance using the organization's systems, and worked effectively in a remote environment.

education.institution: Fakultet Informacijskih Tehnologija – Univerzitet 'Džemal Ćelic' in Mostar

skills: Technical support and IT troubleshooting (Windows OS installation, Office 365 training, SOP development)
